name: the Breath.
description: The Breath is an experimental videogame for single player. Player act as a man, looking for something in the desert. Wandering, breathing, memory appeared, about her. He start imagine, and impatience won't let him rest. At the top of the dune, he saw a crystal tree. He can't tell. He is confused.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750, HD 7790 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980, RX580 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
